评论详情: This is my new favorite skirt. It's comfy, adjustable and soft. The zipper sticks at times, but as long as pulled carefully I haven't had an issue. The skirt does attract dog hair like a magnet at the bottom, but that's more because I'm short and should probably get some heeled boots. Bought it for a new winter skirt and I will be buying in other colors.

I love this skirt!! It’s not too thick, but can keep you warm. It’s very high cut, landing right underneath diaphragm. Plus with the corset look in the back, really flatters the figure! And it has pockets!!

评论概述: Quality is good but read the review
评论详情: I’m not a skinny girl and I’m 5’1.  So it is a little long but I can get that taken up.  The color is correct.  Comfort and thickness and softness are all good.  It is lined which is good.  Overall, worth the money value.  However, because one side is an elastic and the other side is not, the back zip is off centered for something larger the intended size stomach.  For a custom this is not a problem and that is why I’m still giving it a 5 star.

I love this skirt! I wish I could just wear it around in public and not just for an event. I'd say its more medieval/ Renaissance than Victorian, but you could use it for all including viking.  I bought it in large and XL I'm 5'6" 150lbs and really no waistline. The skirt has a corset style waist band that creates one for you. It goes right up under the boob line. You can loosen or tighten the waist at the back. I am right in between the 2 sizes. I can fit in the L, but I enjoy comfort, so I went with XL and had someone just lace me up in the back to tighten it. It has a liner so pretty fine wprkmanship, like real clothing not a cheap costume.. Hope this helps!

I got the bluish gray color, and I absolutely love it! Great feel to the fabric, adjustable lace-up back, side zipper—it’s definitely well constructed. Fit true to size for me, and the color is what I hoped it would be. I just wish there were pockets and a hook and eye at the top of the zipper. It’s perfect for my steampunk look!
The skirt was beautiful although it was the wrong size for me
Fits great and looks great!

评论概述: Style is the only thing great about this
评论详情: I strongly suggest washing this thing and letting it soak in cold water it bleeds really bad, the inner black skirt will turn your skin black and the outer brown will stain every time you touch it your hands in your nails will be corroded with this brown be sure to wash and soak in cold water with vinegar thoroughly

The top of the wide waist band will go under the bust. The bottom of the band goes on your waist. If you’ve had kids, your ribs have likely expanded and you might fit better into a size up. I usually wear a medium but the large fit tight. Just could barely get the zipper closed. There’s elastic in the back with a lace up tie to snug it so it looks authentic.
I love this skirt I purchased 3 colors fits beautiful ..I use for every day does not look costume  looks fabulous very flattering

评论概述: A bit tricky to get in and out of but so beautiful!
评论详情: The material is a little thick and if you're like me with extremely thick hips and thighs, it is very tricky to get in and out of. That being said, once it's on it looks amazing, I've seen some reviews complaining about the zipper but I haven't had any issues so far. Be careful in hot weather in this skirt, it's not the thickest material but it's thick enough to cause some concern with those who can't handle hot weather. If it had pockets it would be perfect!
Bought this for 1880 century outfit and love the material. Skirt is heavy and the fabric is amazing.
Love the skirt.  I added slit. I received many compliments from it.
Skirt is well made and material is nice but I would recommend ordering up 2 sizes measurements are way off.

评论概述: It was a well received gift!
评论详情: Interesting, but not weird. Quality skirt that is fun and flattering. It had to be ironed after washing though- it still looked good- but all that long/ full material was labor intensive. Consider Fabreeze and spot cleaning if you can get away with it!😆
Love the material. Very thick. I like the adjustable lace back for the perfect fit. It was a nice touch that it came with an underlayer so I didn't need to add one myself. I wanted all the colors!!
Very small sized. Size up 2 American sizes
I’m a regular US XL and this one fits like a medium. Returned.

I really like the look of the skirt. It’s very true to the picture as far as the high waisted. There’s a corset cinch in the back With a side zipper. My only concern is how to get all the wrinkles out. It’s a pseudo-suede and so I’m not sure how well they iron will work. Other than that I would recommend the skirt.

This was long enough for someone 5’6” with a low to medium heeled boot on. The other skirt I tried off a different site had a beautiful fabric I loved, but was too short. Pay attention to the length when you purchase.

I dressed as Enola Holmes for my work’s Halloween costume contest. This skirt is very good quality and I received numerous compliments on the quality as well as the color. My friends said they would wear it anywhere! I’m 5’2, 123 lbs and a small fit perfectly after a bit of stretching the waist. Length was perfect with a one inch heel. Side zipper could be a bit sturdier.
The skirt fit perfectly and is a step up from costumes sold at stores like Spirit Halloween store or Party City
Just wish it had pockets! Other than that, it was beautiful and warm
Great skirt..It was not actually  blue Jean.. blue Jean look but very elegant.
It is very comfortable and the perfect length. My only complaint is that the zipper always gets stuck
One small problem, it needs a different zipper or closure. When on its very difficult to get it passed the waist band. The skirt itself is very nice.

Received skirt balled up in the bag and ridiculously wrinkled. Obviously a previous return. Zipper is terrible. Needs a hook/eye closer for an invisible zipper on such a thick seam. 5'8 and length hit above the ankle. Was a weird length and checking other sizes doesn't get much longer. Fabric was nice for the cost, but would be disappointed to pay more than $30 for it. Not enough redeeming factors to keep.

I'm so in love w/ this skirt! Just wow! I've always loved vintage like clothing. It's hard for me to find skirts that are long enough for me & are good quality. The length is perfect & the quality is AMAZING! I'm 5'7 & 138 lbs. Also, I LOVE long skirts! I'm tall, slim & the medium fits perfectly. It's so beautiful! I feel like Anne, from "Anne of Green Gables." 😌 lol If I could give this 100 stars, I would! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

Based on other reviews I was prepared to make modifications. I added a hook and eye clasp at the top of the zipper to make it easier to close. I love the way this skirt fits, it's super comfortable and so much fun to walk around in!

I absolutely adore this skirt. The fabric is high quality, and feels like a dream. It fits lovely (I went up one size thanks to other reviews - I’m 5’2” and 112lbs, and ordered a medium. Length is spot on and it can be tightened with the corset backing, but fits just fine otherwise) I love how it flows and moves. It’s just divine!

This is SO GREAT!  I love this skirt so much I can't even right now!  It fits perfectly, hitting just above the floor out of tripping range.  I love that you can adjust the waist to make it look just right!  And the gathered material in the back looks bustle-like, giving it that perfect little flair!  If you're on the fence about this, just get it!!!

评论概述: Was very cute but too small; had to return the item.
评论详情: Skirt was very cute but too small unfortunately I had to return the item.
The garment has a nice weight to it and the lining makes it a full shape. Great price too.

This skirt is the perfect length for me, I am 5'7 and it reaches just past my ankles. Waist sits right above my natural waist. This is rare as i have a longer torso. The corset back is great at slightly tightening your shape. Ensure you undo the corset all the way regardless of the elastic back and zipper, especially if you have hips. The skirt fits like a glove, perfect, but you have to ensure you put it on and take off right. It has a 2nd layer of lining inside, not the softest, but that barely affects the feeling. Outside material is soft but structured and quite thick  Will have to iron the skirt though as it came folded and quite wrinkled. However, it has straighten/smoothed a little after hanging for a few days. Overall really happy with the purchase. Highly recommend
This skirt has substance! It is gorgeous on and even though it was used as a costume, my daughter had worn it out a few times. It’s lovely and very good quality.

I love how it fits and I was unsure of this purchase as a plus size woman, I wear a 1x-2x and not only was I able to zip it but the corset part made it fit just right. Would definitely buy from this store again

评论概述: I have a VERY hard time zipping up the zipper
评论详情: The only thing I have an issue with is the zipper! It's nearly impossible to get the zipper past the junction of the waistband and body of the skirt! I would suggest a heftier tab on the zipper, or replacing the zipper with sm buttons. Otherwise, I'm very comfortable wearing the garment! I will order this skirt again and if the zipper issue isn't addressed, I'll replace it with sm buttons!

It was exactly what I was looking for. My only problem with it was the zipper on the side. The zipper doesn't have a hook on the top to keep the sides together while you work the zipper. I needed a second person to hold the sides together while I zipper it up. Other than that it's a great skirt. Super comfortable, pretty color, and the perfect hight.

Bought for my wife; her review: I haven't tried it out fully yet, but first time putting it on is great! The zipper goes farther then it seems. It gets a little stuck at the form fitting part. For me who's 4'11 and 1in heels it's the perfect length. It is thick, so I'm worried about getting warm in it.

I got this skirt for my Halloween costume. I wasn’t expecting it to be as nice as it was. Usually, costume type skirts will be super staticky or lay flat. This one was comfortable and had a good full skirt without having to use a petticoat.  The zipper on the side is pretty delicate, so definitely pay attention to the sizing dimensions and don’t tug on it. I’m 5’3 133 lbs with pretty wide hips and the medium fit me perfectly.

评论概述: Order slightly larger than you think.
评论详情: I am normally size 12-14, so I ordered XL. It is a little loose, but comfortable.  But it is so long, that I am wearing the waist  up at "princess" level.  I hope to have alterations made before wearing it to my daughter's Victorian/Steampunk wedding.

honestly fit very well. i ordered what i usually get, which is either a medium or large. it’s a lot more flattering than i thought it would be and perfect for a renaissance or medieval outfit. definitely measure yourself if you aren’t sure. also alongside the other reviews, be careful with the zipper
Runs small compared to US sizes.
I have 3 of these, today my brown one arrived and it is gorgeous. Very soft fabric, well made and when I wear these I get so many compliments. LOVE and I will buy in every color .

Love it! The color of the material and is soo soft . so beautiful! I am 5 ft 130lbs  and i got a medium. i have bigger thighs and some tummy pudge. At first b4 i found the side zipper i was like nooooo it stopped at my thighs. But then found the zipper and skirt fits great! You do have to be gentle/careful with the zipper tho feels like it could break easy. Going to wear it to a medival themed wedding. Love it so glad it fit!
Would look good on many different heights!

评论概述: Great quality and the perfect Victorian fancy dress
评论详情: I bought this for a fancy dress party. It arrived in a plastic parcel and a little scrunched up as a consequence. I used the measurements on the site and it fit perfectly. The detailing is fantastic and it is well made, I only wish I had more excuses to wear it. Would happily purchase from this supplier again.

评论概述: The skirt is a little big
评论详情: It’s exactly as pictured in the photos! I absolutely love it! I wear a lot of old cottage core clothes and I wanted to look like Sofia The 1st when she went on a beach picnic lol.

The skirt is lovely! It is quite difficult to get on by yourself. It has a fullness to it already, and it's a nice, weighted fabric! So a petticoat is definitely optional. I did knock a star off because the zipper is difficult, but that's a very minor issue.

评论概述: Tight and meant for people with long torsos
评论详情: It’s smaller than what you expect and you need a long torso to wear it properly
I don’t typically leave reviews but I just had to for this skirt. I am in love!!!  Corset and skirt in one!!

I ordered 2 different sizes, as I wasn’t 100% sure about the fitting. I did size up, in the end. The skirt itself is really nice and comfortable.  But I had to knock a star off because I had ordered both sizes “new,” and received one that was clearly not “new.” This normally wouldn’t be a problem...except for the fact there was a dirty sock rolled up in the folds of the skirt. I didn’t realize it until after I had tried it on, either. I put it on and caught a whiff of something not good and thought, “oh yeah, definitely have to wash this,” looked down and said, “oh god, that’s not my sock.”
The quality is so much better than what was expected! Would buy again!
I sent 1st one back because it was too small.  There are laces in back, so you can draw it in to your body, so going one size larger is not a problem.  The zipper is cheap, but the skirt is stunning.

This! I know you’re thinking, 40 DOLLARS?? Listen! It’s worth it! The fabric is thick, and warm, but not hot or uncomfortable. It is soft, and I mean soft! I could sleep in it! The fabric feels soooo rich, and you can tighten it or loosen it to your liking! I’m relatively skinny so it’s hard to find clothes that fit my waist justtttt right, especially because I’m a dude and a bit boxy, but damn! And did I mention the way it FLOWS WHEN YOU SPIN! My. *chef’s kiss* I will be wearing this ALL the time!!!  My only recommendation is, ADD POCKETS! This skirt is perfect otherwise, but I knowww big ol’ pockets CAN fit and would be sooo useful!
Description said to order 1 size larger and it was still too small.
Good
High-waisted but adjustable. Material is amazing. Thick but soft. Drapes well. Length is perfect -- Mid calf or longer depending on height.
Very happy with this purchase. I ordered the medium and it fits well, with the back adjustments being flexible to make it tighter or more loose. Darling skirt.

this skirt is really nice! it came in with the laces already loose, it's thick, soft, and comfortable . and i'm about 5 feet tall, and got a size xs and it  fit perfectly! i really recommend this skirt.

评论概述: A beautiful piece to add to any costume
评论详情: This skirt is beautiful and for the most part it is very well made. BUT...all the reviews about the zipper are sadly correct, it catches and is kind of a pain. If you can get past that it’s a beautiful piece though. I wore this for Halloween this year and received endless compliments on the authenticity of my costume. Definitely recommend

评论概述: The length is great , fits good and tight around the bodice !
评论详情: It's  a great dress but the zipper on the side is terrible !  In just a couple of time's being worn the zipper spit . I can't return it since I

This skirt is very cute and made out of a substantial yet soft suede-like material, with a black internal underskirt. I can see what other reviewers say about the side zipper - it's stubborn and difficult to zip up, especially at the part where the wider skirt meets the more slender waist part. I can see it potentially breaking in the future there but will probably just sew on buttons to replace it. Other than the zipper, this is a lot better quality than I expected to receive for the price. The skirt has some volume without needing anything under it. It's not itchy or uncomfortable. I'm a size 12, about a 30.5" waist, and the Large fits snugly without seeming like it's too tight. I was expecting it to feel a little more costume-y and am pleasantly surprised.

Fits as expected, the elastic in the back is useful, don't lace yourself in too tight! Very comfortable, very cute, EXACTLY what I wanted/needed. The skirt is not sheer, it's made of a few layers of fabric and is thick enough you could be reasonably warm with the addition of some insulated tights.

评论概述: Beautiful skirt- but some negative aspects
评论详情: Overall I loved the skirt, I’ll be wearing it many, many more times. The GOOD aspects of it: I found it very flattering, the material is thick and good quality, and I didn’t even need to wear a petticoat underneath since it had enough body on its own. The NEGATIVE things: the size chart isn’t quite accurate. I almost ordered a M but I am glad I ordered the L. I’m 5’8, 145lbs, 30in waist. When I first put it on, it was tight and uncomfortable, but it did give a little throughout the day, and it wasn’t uncomfortable to sit down in for extended periods of time. If I order again (I probably will in another color) I’ll get an XL and rely on the corset-like back to tie up where it might be loose. The other disappointing part was the fact that one of the buttons came off within the first hour. I’m going to just remove the other buttons and sew my own on there. As for the zipper- my partner noticed that there was an accidental stitch that came from the waist seam that was sewn INTO the zipper. Once we cut that, the zipper worked perfectly fine, I was able to get it on by myself. So if you find yourself having major problems with the zipper, check for that first.
Great material and comfy fit! Pleasantly pleased.

This will be my third time ordering this skirt. I need it for a cosplay and I absolutely adore it however the first time I ordered it, the skirt was too small even with the adjustable straps in the back. I ordered a medium and I am 5’1” and weigh 148. The second time I ordered a large and the fit was perfect! However there was long hair all over the skirt and it had an Oder to it. So I am returning this one as well in hopes to get a new skirt and not used. Wish me luck. I will update my review after the next skirt comes in. Again great quality so far, just need my size and a new skirt.  UPDATE: So the third time it came back I am pretty sure they just recent me the 2nd skirt as the turn around time was far shorter than the 1st and 2nd time and the order on the item was the same as the second but as I need this item for a cosplay I won’t be taking the time yet again to resend. So overall great quality good item just be careful of sizing and receiving worn materials.

This skirt makes me feel like I’m going to a renaissance festival whenever I wear it. Its thick material will definitely be handy in the fall and winter months; I was sweating just putting it on (as it’s summer at the time I’m writing this review). The zipper is a bit difficult to use, but if you have a partner to hold the two sides of fabric together, it will be much easier to handle. The corset strings in the back are very long and adjustable, which makes it perfect for a much broader figure like mine.

This skirt fit nicely! It's laced in the back so you can make it as tight or loose as you like. I read complaints on the zipper, but mine was just fine. It zipped up smoothly, stayed put, and hasn't fallen apart (although I have only worn the skirt once so far). To get the poof, you might want to get a petticoat. I was cheap and didn't want to buy one, so I ended up using an old tutu I had and it worked great

I adore this skirt. I followed the sizing chart and it fits perfectly (I’m usually a size 4/6 and I have a 27 inch waist; I ordered a small). I saw some reviews mention issues with the zipper. While it is finicky around the seam where the skirt transitions into the waist portion, it’s not impossible or overly complicated. It’s an issue I encounter with a lot of skirts so it didn’t bother me. The green is a gorgeous color as well.

The skirt is actually exceptionally well-made and more than exceeded my expectations! For reference, I'm 5'6" and about 120 lbs. I ordered the Medium, as I read some people said it ran small, others said true-to-size, but either way, the lacing in the back makes adjustments easy. For me, the Medium fits perfectly and the lacing (pictured) can expand or tighten quite a bit to accommodate variations in size. My zipper sticks a little, but hasn't yet given me the problems it has for some other reviewers.
Incredible!

I was pleasantly surprised by how fast it shipped, how well it was packaged and how wrinkle-free it was. I know many garments bought online have to be ironed before use but this one didn't. The suede-like material feels so nice and soft. The lining is thin but perfect for warmer weather. You could probably get away with wearing it in the dead of Winter with a warm petticoat beneath it. I agree with other reviewers that the zipper sticks. I plan to help with that by installing a hook & eye, so I can zip it without help.  The fit is perfect. I am 5'1 and have a 32 inch waist and the large fit perfectly and just barely brushed the floor when worn directly beneath the bust. It's also surprisingly nice to wear on a warm day. I didn't overheat at all. This is less a necessity and more a recommendation but it looks amazing with a simple cotton peasant blouse shirt tucked in.

评论概述: Stunning, but too small for me
评论详情: The quality of the fabric was great, felt heavy and high quality, and overall the contruction of it was great. Unfortunately, I think my hips are just a little bit too big. When I tried fitting it over my shoulders, my husband had to help me in and out, and I got a little stuck... it was an ordeal. However, when I finally got it on and fitted around my waist it fit perfectly. I wish there had been just an extra inch or two to loosen it up before putting it on/off.
Loved this skirt!!! Super cute and good material ❤️

Ok I have to say this skirt is even better in person than in the pictures. I absolutely love this. It's so extremely soft. It is made amazingly well. It is so comfortable. It goes all the way to the floor just how I wanted. It has a perfect weight to it. Not to heavy but heavy enough  to keep it from flying up. This is definitely  hands down one of my favorite clothing items.
This is absolutely gorgeous! I wore it for a performance.  Only thing is, the zipper did not zip all the way down, so it was a pain to put on and off. But overall,  beautiful.
I love this skirt!
Surprisingly, well made! I am very pleased with this purchase.

I could not be happier with this skirt! Material is good quality, fits perfectly! I’m familiar with this zipper type and think the skirt could benefit from a hook clasp closure at the top to aid in zipping it easier, but other than that it’s PERFECT! 10/10 recommend! I have  35 inch waist and 43 inch hips and the XL fits me perfectly!
Great for cosplay

评论用户: A human that buys things here
评论详情: Great color and look but the zipper is difficult to zip up. Holding the dress opening together will help bring the zipper up. The price is high for something you’ll not be using often.

评论概述: Way too small for an XL
评论详情: Waist is about a 10 or 12  zipper stuck at seam. Had to return

评论概述: Such a nice skirt for the price!
评论详情: Perfect! Worth the purchase and quality item for this skirt! Quite a nice surprise!!!
Beautiful and made with great material

I LOVE this skirt! I bought it for a costume, but I honestly want to wear it everyday. It's wonderfully soft, fully lined,  very flattering, and has a nice weight that gives it lovely swishy movement as you walk. I'm probably going to buy it in more colors just because it's so fun to wear.
Wonderful skirt! Material is durable and very soft. Comfortable and great fit

Looks great in pictures. A bit frumpy in person so I returned it.  If you are going to use this for ren faire for a peasant character and will have accessories to go along with it, it could work.  On it's own it's a bit mehhh.  The fabric is nice and a good weight- not at all flimsy.
This skirt was amazing. I used it as a costume piece for a musical I did. It fit so well and comfortably. It’s stretchy in the back and has the corset laces too. It was perfect.

评论概述: Be prepared to buy all of them ‼️
评论详情: I love it ‼️ Getting ready to buy the other colors ‼️ Looking for blouses to go with them. 😊

I’m usually a size small but I ordered a medium to be safe, and still fit very tight, should have gotten a large. Also the zipper is very cheap and actually broke off my dress! Had to repair the zipper three times in one day! Good for costuming but I can’t imagine for everyday wear, too cheap.

I love this skirt and I wish I could give it a 5 star review! The problem is that the zipper is extremely poor and gets stuck where the dress changes shape. We got two of these for two different people and sized people. Bot dresses had this issue..and eventually both dresses zippers broke!  Besides the zipper issue these are absolutely beautiful skirts and so so soft and very warm! Great for the winter and the fall.

评论概述: It's very soft and comfortable, just have zipper troubles.
评论详情: I love this dress, and it got through Haunt Season and held up very well. I made sure to read sizing charts and everything, so I knew I got the right size, however I still struggle with the zipper some times, just trying to get it to fully zip up. However, the skirt is very soft and held up well against wind and rain in the outside scare zones. I loved the inner lining, it helped to keep me warmer through-out the entire season.

Love this skirt!! The material is high quality and color is majestic. I’m 5’4”, 136lbs, hourglass shape, getting the skirt up over my hips needs to be taken slow, even with the zipper open, but once it’s in place, zippered & lace tightened up the back, it fits perfectly. Probably could’ve gone with the large, but the length of the medium is perfect so I’ll stick with it. Zipper is a little sticky but so far I haven’t had a real issue with it.

评论概述: Amazing costume/theatrical piece for the price.
评论详情: Amazing Quality! I'm 5'8, 29 in waist, 41 hip and Medium was perfect. Adjustable corset on back. Fell at my ankles so a little short for me. The zipper on this, as most have mentioned in the reviews, is basically non existent - it's super fragile and thin and very hard to maneuver.

Wow the fabric is fantastic! High quality beautiful corset built into the waist. Very beautiful and even has a cute poof at the back if you want to go for a more victorian look. Loved this skirt so much.  Just wish it was a little shorter. I'm 5 3 and I had to wear heels. I'm also very petite 105 or 110. Felt adorable walking in this and got many compliments. Wish the zipper was a little sturdier that's my only complaint.  Was afraid I'd tear it.

I loved the length of this dress. Although, it was very long for me. I am 5'1 and 110 pounds. Even with 1 inch heels, i stepped on my skirt. The zipper was very difficult, and the first time i was afraid it didnt fit me, but it is just that the zipper is hard to zip up. I got a lot of compliments on it, and asking where i got it. A lot of my friends also touched my skirt and loved the material.

I don't usually write reviews but I LOVE this skirt. I sized up 1 from my usual M to a L and it fit perfectly. Like others have said be careful with the zipper. Otherwise its beautiful and  fits well. Also love the material.
Love everything about it but, the zipper. It is very hard to close at the seam where the long part of the skirt meets the waist.

Cute skirt. Like a velvety material. Used in a Victorian-esque shoot and it worked great. I haven’t washed it yet so I am not sure how it holds us. Will adjust my review if necessary, but right now I am extremely happy with my purchase.
